gwt.g2d.client.graphics
Class Color

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g2d.client.graphics.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
KnownColor
public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Stores a color. Color is immutable.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Constructor Detail

Color

public Color(int red,
             int green,
             int blue,
             double alpha)
Represents a color that contains transparency. The color code is represented in the form "rgba(r,g,b,a)".

Parameters:
red - red channel [0-255]
green - green channel [0-255]
blue - blue channel [0-255]
alpha - alpha channel [0.0, 1.0]

Color

public Color(int red,
             int green,
             int blue)
Construct a web-safe color. The color code is represented in the form "#RRGGBB" which represents an RGB color using hexadecimal numbers.

Parameters:
red - red channel [0-255]
green - green channel [0-255]
blue - blue channel [0-255]
